proposta_di_tesi.errore_proposta_di_tesi: Error while rendering the thesis proposal
proposta_di_tesi.modal_contenuto: Are you sure you want to apply for this thesis proposal?
proposta_di_tesi.successo_content: You can check the status of your application on the page related to your thesis.
proposta_di_tesi.errore_content: An error occurred while sending the application. Please try again later.

tesi.title: Thesis
tesi.section_description: Section dedicated to managing your thesis, from the initial application to uploading the final work.
tesi.error: Error while rendering the active thesis

thesis_progress.pending_description: Your application has been correctly submitted and is under review by the supervisor. During this period, you cannot yet view the outcome or details of the evaluation. The system will send an automatic notification as soon as the evaluation procedure is completed.
thesis_progress.pending_to_submit_description: No application has been submitted yet.
thesis_progress.approved_description: Your application has been evaluated positively by the supervisor and is approved. You are now authorized to proceed with the subsequent obligations provided for in the thesis initiation process, following the timing and methods indicated by the regulations.
thesis_progress.rejected_description: The supervisor has expressed a negative opinion regarding the application submitted, which is therefore rejected. You have the opportunity to consult any reasons or additional notes entered by the supervisor by accessing the activity history section directly.
thesis_progress.cancelled_description: You have decided to withdraw this application. As a result, the thesis proposal is no longer under evaluation and cannot be considered by the supervisor. If you wish, you can submit a new application for another available thesis proposal.
thesis_progress.outcome_description: In this section, the final judgment expressed by the supervisor at the end of the evaluation phase will be displayed. The student will receive a formal communication as soon as the results are made public and available for consultation.
thesis_progress.ongoing: Your thesis is currently in progress under the supervision of the assigned supervisor.
thesis_progress.conclusion_request: Request confirmation of the thesis conclusion from the supervisor once the work is completed.
thesis_progress.conclusion_outcome: Wait for the supervisor's decision on your conclusion request.
thesis_progress.conclusion_confirmed: The supervisor has confirmed the thesis conclusion. You can now proceed with the final steps.
thesis_progress.conclusion_rejected: The supervisor rejected the conclusion request. Review any notes and update the thesis before sending a new request.
thesis_progress.almalaurea: Complete the AlmaLaurea questionnaire by the established deadline. The link to access the questionnaire will be available in this section.
thesis_progress.compiled_questionnaire: After AlmaLaurea, complete the end-of-course questionnaire required by the portal before final exam registration.
thesis_progress.final_exam: Register for the final exam through this page once you have obtained confirmation of the thesis conclusion.
thesis_progress.final_thesis: Upload the final version of the thesis following the instructions provided by the supervisor and the regulations.
thesis_progress.final_upload_outcome: Waiting for the outcome of the final thesis upload review.
thesis_progress.final_upload_approved: The final thesis upload has been approved. The thesis process is complete.
thesis_progress.final_upload_rejected: The final thesis upload was rejected. The thesis returns to 'ongoing' for revisions.
thesis_progress.cancel_requested: You have requested the cancellation of the thesis
thesis_progress.cancel_outcome: Waiting for the outcome of the thesis cancellation request

tesi.start_thesis_content: Are you sure you want to start your thesis? Once started, you will no longer be able to apply for other thesis proposals. This action cannot be undone.
tesi.success_thesis_started_content: You have successfully started your thesis. You can now proceed with the next steps as indicated by your supervisor.
tesi.error_thesis_started_content: An error occurred while starting the thesis. Please try again later.
tesi.success_application_cancelled_content: You can now apply for other thesis proposals.
tesi.error_application_cancelled_content: An error occurred while canceling the application. Please try again later.
tesi.success_cancel_request_content: The request was sent to the supervisor. Waiting for the outcome.
tesi.error_cancel_request: Error while sending the thesis cancellation request.
tesi.error_cancel_request_content: An error occurred while sending the thesis cancellation request. Please try again later.

modal_cancel.title: Cancel thesis
modal_cancel.body: Are you sure you want to cancel your thesis? This action cannot be undone.

information.title: Thesis request tips
information.line_1: Review the available proposals and choose the ones that best match your interests, otherwise consider submitting a custom request.
information.line_2: Contact a potential supervisor first to confirm availability and alignment on the topic.
information.line_3: In the topic field, write a few clear lines: motivation and relevant skills.
information.line_4: Review your request before submitting and make sure the title and topic are clear and consistent.
information.line_5: If you do not receive a reply, you can send a brief follow-up after a few days.

no_application.title: No application submitted
no_application.content: There is currently no information available about your thesis because you have not yet submitted an application. Explore the available proposals or submit a custom thesis request.

tesi.mock_status_update_error_content: Unable to update thesis status. Please try again later.
tesi.mock_almalaurea_update_success_content: You have completed the AlmaLaurea questionnaire. You can now proceed to the next steps.
tesi.mock_almalaurea_update_error_title: Error while completing the AlmaLaurea questionnaire.
tesi.mock_almalaurea_update_error_content: There was an error while completing the AlmaLaurea questionnaire. Please try again later.
tesi.mock_questionnaire_update_success_conten: You have completed the final course questionnaire. You can now proceed to the next steps.
tesi.mock_questionnaire_update_error_title: Error while completing the final course questionnaire.
tesi.mock_questionnaire_update_error_content: There was an error while completing the final course questionnaire. Please try again later.
tesi.mock_final_exam_enrolment_success_conten: You are registered for the final exam. Make sure all required steps are completed before the exam date.
tesi.mock_final_exam_enrolment_error_content: There was an error during final exam registration. Please try again later.
tesi.no_deadlines_content: There are no upcoming deadlines for your thesis. Keep checking this section to stay updated on the next steps.

deadlines.internship_report: Internship report and other activities submission

tesi.timeline_tooltip: The timeline shows the main phases of your thesis.

richiesta_tesi.title: Thesis Request
richiesta_tesi.success_content: The selected supervisor will be contacted to evaluate your thesis proposal.
richiesta_tesi.error_content: An error occurred while submitting the request. Please try again later.
richiesta_tesi.too_long: The thesis topic exceeds the allowed character limit

modal_cancel.title: Cancel thesis
modal_cancel.body: Are you sure you want to cancel your thesis? This action cannot be undone.

next_steps_cancelled.title: Next steps
next_steps_cancelled.content: You have cancelled your thesis application. You can now apply for other thesis proposals or submit a new custom thesis request.

next_steps_rejected.title: Next steps
next_steps_rejected.content: Your thesis application has been rejected by the supervisor. For further information, contact the supervisor directly. You can also apply for other thesis proposals or submit a new custom thesis request.

next_steps_cancel_approved.title: Next steps
next_steps_cancel_approved.content: Your thesis has been cancelled. You can now apply for other thesis proposals or submit a new custom thesis request.

conclusione_tesi.title: Thesis conclusion request
conclusione_tesi.description: Send the thesis conclusion request to your supervisor. The thesis will be closed only after supervisor confirmation.
conclusione_tesi.success_content: The supervisor will receive the request to confirm the thesis conclusion.
conclusione_tesi.error: Error while sending the conclusion request.
conclusione_tesi.error_content: An error occurred while sending the request. Please try again later.
conclusione_tesi.confirm_body: Are you sure you want to send the thesis conclusion request?
conclusione_tesi.co_supervisors_help: To remove a co-supervisor, click the X on the badge.
conclusione_tesi.title_translation: English translation of the title (maximum 255 characters)
conclusione_tesi.title_translation_help: Required if the thesis language is not English.
conclusione_tesi.abstract_translation: English translation of the abstract (maximum 3550 characters)
conclusione_tesi.abstract_translation_help: Required if the thesis language is not English.
conclusione_tesi.sdg_description_1: The 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development is a plan of action adopted by the governments of 193 UN member States in September 2015. The 2030 Agenda includes 17 strategic objectives for sustainable development (the so called - Sustainable Development Goals -, SDGs) into a wider programme of action of 169 targets. Each SDG represents a common global goal that addresses crucial development issues for the world such as ending poverty and hunger, fighting climate change, to name just a few of them here. The world officially begun implementation of the SDGs in January 2016 with the objective of reaching the targets by 2030.
conclusione_tesi.sdg_description_2: Politecnico di Torino intends to acknowledge the work of students who decide to study the issues of the 2030 Agenda. For this reason, students can choose one or more SDGs that can be associated with their Master's thesis. Please select the most relevant SDG (and max. two secondary SGDs) that you want to link to your thesis. If the content of your thesis is not directly connected to any target of the SDGs, please select "NOT APPLICABLE".
conclusione_tesi.authorization_authorize: Authorize (free consultation via Webthesis and Library)
conclusione_tesi.license_choice: Choose the license under which the thesis will be distributed
conclusione_tesi.authorization_deny: Do not authorize (requires motivation and embargo period)
conclusione_tesi.embargo_details:
In any case an information sheet with your metadata (first and last name, thesis title and Supervisor/s) will be available for consultation in the Library online catalogue. 
 At the end of this period, your thesis will be released with an "Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs CC BY-NC-ND" license. This license is the most restrictive of the six main CC licenses, only allowing others to download your works and share them with others as long as they credit you, but they can't change them in any way or use them commercially.
conclusione_tesi.pdfa_conversion_info: Before uploading the final thesis, make sure your document is in PDF format and convert it to PDF/A using the dedicated service. After conversion, come back to this page and upload the file in the Final thesis PDF/A field.
conclusione_tesi.summary_for_committee_subtext: You must deposit a summary of your thesis only if required by your degree programme. In this phase, you can upload a preliminary version of your abstract. You will have the chance to update your abstract when you deposit the final version of your thesis.

declarations.student_declarations_intro: You are the author of your thesis and declare under your own responsibility that:
declarations.declaration_1: you understand that Politecnico has adopted a web-based service for plagiarism detection (Compilation.net software)
declarations.declaration_2: you expressly authorize Politecnico to upload, store, disseminate, reproduce and use your thesis in the Compilatio.net database for an indefinite period of time with the sole purpose of detecting plagiarism by comparing your thesis with the contents available in the database or with other contents added to it at a later stage (for non-embargoed thesis only).
declarations.declaration_3: you understand that Compilatio.net is a support tool for your Supervisor but it does not replace the work carried out by the Graduation Examining Committee for the evaluation of your thesis's quality and originality.
declarations.declaration_4: the thesis that you uploaded is an "original product" and does not infringe the legislation on Intellectual Property Rights.
declarations.declaration_5: you waive and release Politecnico of any liability which could ever derive from claims by third parties concerning the contents and/or structure of your thesis, including possible infringement of Intellectual Property Rights.
declarations.declaration_6: you understand that your personal data will be transferred to the Compilatio.net service provider in order to get access to its basic service and to "Studium", in compliance with Legislative Decree no. 196 of 30th June 2003, with the sole purpose of consenting service operations. Any other possible use of your personal data is strictly prohibited.

conclusione_tesi.declarations_required: You must accept all declarations to proceed.

sdg.title: Sustainable Development Goals - SDGs
sdg.description: The 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development is an action program signed in September 2015 by the governments of the 193 UN member countries. It includes 17 strategic Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in a major action program with a total of 169 targets. Each SDG represents a common global objective on important development issues such as fighting poverty, eliminating hunger, and combating climate change, to name just a few (here is the complete list of SDGs: https://unric.org/en/agenda-2030/). The official launch of the Sustainable Development Goals coincided with the beginning of 2016 and marks the start of a journey that member countries have committed to undertake to achieve the identified targets by 2030.
sdg.sub_description: The Polytechnic University of Turin aims to highlight the studies and research that its students carry out on the topics of the 2030 Agenda by allowing them to assign one or more SDGs to their Master's Thesis work. For this reason, you are asked to select the most relevant SDG (and up to two secondary ones) to associate with your thesis. If your work does not have content directly related to any SDG targets, you can select the 'NOT APPLICABLE' option.

conclusione_tesi.draft_saved: The thesis conclusion request draft has been saved successfully. You can continue filling the form or go back to the thesis page.
conclusione_tesi.draft_load_failed: Unable to load the saved draft.

conclusione_tesi.request_submitted_content: The supervisor will receive the request to confirm the conclusion of the thesis.

conclusione_tesi.final_thesis_uploaded_content: Your final thesis has been uploaded successfully. Get ready for the discussion!
conclusione_tesi.final_thesis_upload_failed_content: An error occurred while uploading the final thesis. Please try again later.
conclusione_tesi.not_eligible_message: You are not eligible to request a thesis conclusion. Please verify that you have met all the necessary requirements.
conclusione_tesi.success_message: Your thesis conclusion request has been submitted. You can return to the thesis page to check its status.
